html: Let them show unto them "Let them declare unto us"— For למו lamo , unto them, the Chaldee reads לנו lanu , unto us The Septuagint read לכם lachem , unto you; which is preferable to the reading of the text. But למו lamo , and לנו lanu , are frequently mistaken one for the other, seeIsaiah 10:29 ;Psalm 80:7; Psalm 64:6 .
